{"id":1507804552,"question_id":2766,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 weeks, 3 days","timestamp":1736816046,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"27 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1507804552/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Prefix Common Array of Two Arrays","memory":"94.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<int> findThePrefixCommonArray(vector<int>& A, vector<int>& B) {\n        //You are given two 0-indexed integer permutations A and B of length n.\n        int n = A.size();\n        vector<int> C;\n        unordered_set<int> Aset;\n        unordered_set<int> Bset;\n        unordered_set<int> Cset;\n        for(int i=0; i<n; i++) {\n            if(A[i]==B[i]) {\n                Cset.insert(A[i]);\n            } else {\n                if(Aset.count(B[i]))\n                     Cset.insert(B[i]);\n                if(Bset.count(A[i]))\n                    Cset.insert(A[i]);\n            }\n            Aset.insert(A[i]);\n            Bset.insert(B[i]);\n            C.push_back(Cset.size());\n        }\n        return C;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-prefix-common-array-of-two-arrays","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
